We designed all your creative things with full of ❤ since 2015

Established in 2015, PT. Miskat Alam Internasional is an event organizer company in Jakarta that handles all your creatives with a lot of cup of coffee and full of ❤.

What we can do?

We give you the best end-to-end in Media and Communication services from offline to vica versa

Creative Concept

We over you a creative concept based on your strength.

Communication

Giving the best added value in the way of your communication.

Marketing

Getting customer based on your unique selling point and data driven.

Measurable

Giving you the right measurement tools to analyze the effectiveness.
